question: Which Indian sportsperson has clinched silver in women's 69kg category at the 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship?
explanation: Three Indian women wrestlers Sakshi Malik (60kg), Vinesh Phogat (55kg) and Divya Kakran (69kg) bagged silver medals in their respective categories in the 2017 Asian Wrestling Championship in New Delhi after losing out their final bouts. Rio Olympic bronze medallist Sakshi Malik lost her final bout against Japanâ€™s Risako Kawai in 60kg category. Sakshi wrestled for the first time in women\'s 60kg category after jumping up the weight division from 58kg. Vinesh Phogat lost the final in women\'s 55kg category and Divya Kakran in 69 Kg to settle with silver medals.
